snippet: The pianist Maxim Anikushin deftly showed his affinity for Samuel Barber in a concert for Russian-American history month.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance of Barber works by the pianist Maxim Anikushin at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: The pianist Maxim Anikushin deftly showed his affinity for Samuel Barber in a concert for Russian-American history month.

headline.seo: The Pianist Maxim Anikushin at Carnegie Hall
headline.main: A Sense of Glasnost at a Carnegie Keyboard
headline.print_headline: A Sense of Glasnost At a Carnegie Keyboard
